name: Aurum (itch)
description:
Description:

Aurum is a 3D fantasy/adventure game, following Valda a young hunter in training. As the animals and plants begin to be drained of life around her tribe she decides to try and save her home from this strange affliction. She finds there is more to this affliction than first thought and a twisted magic is corrupting her tribe and the planet. Valda must find the source of this magic and heal the planet if she is to save her home, to do so she needs to activate the ancient guardians built by the old light.     

Game Detail: 

Aurum is a student demo game made in Unreal Engine.
